messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]  wood and Home Depot
messages.msgSnippet: ... Nah, why would anyone intentionally leave a piece that they paid for. Lots of that wood is sold by the linear foot, so the person who bought it and had it
messages.messageBody:
>
>
>Here's the thing.....Home Depot sells the piece that they leave anywhere from
>$.91-$2.91.
>There 2 sides I guess....... you can get some good deals, but Home Depot is
>double profiting....
>

Nah, why would anyone intentionally leave a piece that they paid for.
Lots of that wood is sold by the linear foot, so the person who bought
it and had it cut didn't pay for the leftovers. If you buy one that's
"by the piece" you should take the whole thing home.

Tuck
